# Links to Book Code and Additional Data {#book-data}

The code and data and an RStudio project can be downloaded with 

```{r}
#| code-fold: false
#| eval: false
usethis::use_zip(url="https://dicook.github.io/mulgar_book/code_and_data.zip")
```

Alternatively, individual files can be downloaded from the links below.

## Additional data 

```{r}
#| message: false
#| echo: false
library(gt)
library(gtExtras)
library(gtsummary)
library(readr)
library(purrr)
book_data <- read_csv("misc/book_data.csv") 
book_data %>% 
  mutate(Link = map(Link, gt::html)) %>% 
  gt() %>% 
  cols_width(Chapter~px(100), Name~px(200), Link~px(400)) %>%
  cols_align( align = c("left"), columns = everything())
```

## Code files

```{r}
#| message: false
#| echo: false
book_code <- read_csv("misc/book_code.csv") 
book_code %>% 
  mutate(Link = map(Link, gt::html)) %>% 
  gt() %>% 
  cols_width(Chapter~px(300), Link~px(300)) %>%
  cols_align( align = c("left"), columns = everything())
```
